headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) Soared On Investors’ Optimism For Future Power Prices
summary: Carillon Tower Advisers, an investment management company, released its “Carillon Eagle Mid Cap Growth Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Mid-cap stocks experienced a notable improvement in the third quarter after incurring losses in the second quarter. The Russell Midcap Growth Index (up 6.54%) underperformed the […]

headline: Soaring Stocks to Buy for AI and Nuclear Growth: VST, OKLO, BWXT
summary: 3 soaring nuclear energy stocks--BWX Technologies, Inc. (BWXT), Vistra (VST), and Oklo (OKLO)--that investors might want to buy heading into December and hold for long-term growth.

headline: Vistra: Too Much Hype Priced In
summary: Vistra shares gained 332% just in 2024, clearly one of the biggest gainers from the money rotating into utilities. Find out what makes VST stock prudent to hold.
